sentences.sContent: Many men and even women are very judgmental of the need to talk about problems because they have never experienced how healing it can be.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many men and even women are very judgmental of the need to talk about problems because they have never experienced how healing it can be.
sentences.sCn: 许多男人，甚至女人，都把谈论问题的需要视为很严肃、正经的事，因为他们不知该怎么治疗这种需要。

sentences.sContent: Mare and most of all from the founder and director, Marie: I am praying like crazy for you that your graft took and all is healing 100% well.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mare and most of all from the founder and director, Marie: I am praying like crazy for you that your graft took and all is healing 100% well.
sentences.sCn: 还有，最最重要的，来自创办人和董事，玛丽：我由衷企求你所接受的治疗，以及其他所有的都100%有疗效。祝你好运，我的灵魂与你同在。

phrases.pCn: 创伤修复，愈合；伤口愈合

remMethod.val: 来自heal(v. 治疗， 治愈)

words.tran: 医治者（尤指用宗教迷信方式给人治病的人）；治疗物；治病术士

trans.tranCn: 康复， 治疗； 复原
trans.tranOther: the process of becoming healthy and strong again
